text: Aur yaad karo Moosa ki woh baat jo usne apni qaum se kahi thi â€œAey meri qaum ke logon, tum kyun mujhey aziyat (torment /harm) dete ho halaanke tum khoob jaante ho ke main tumhari taraf Allah ka bheja hua Rasool hoon? Phir jab unhon ne tedh ikhtiyar ki (deviated) to Allah ne unke dil tedhey (deviant) kardiye, Allah faasiqon ko hidayat nahin deta
